<@U026PLK4S> : oof, orange not teal
oooh
Sorry
A file was shared
got it
wait
one sec
oooh. i see what you're talking about
ok yeah, hold on one sec
the vroom detail oO is wrong
not the brainy background
let me check that out
before you do anything else
So it looks like the issue is between the overlay_oo files and these files being different?
A file was shared
A file was shared
it's flat, right?
So the overlay_oo background doesn't stretch quite as high when its placed on the view
yeah
A file was shared
That background dark oO is full height, but center and/or aspect fill
two options, i could make the teal one like the orange one (flat) or separate the orange one like the teal one (layered)
looking in the app, i think i prefer the position of the orange actually
so maybe i give you teal, red and purple flat bkgs that are identifal
Ok, so we only update the color of the underlay on those screens, so optimally, there would be some layer version that we could get to size properly?
(I can't tell if im making any sense)
i think i understand. let me try something. i get back to you in a sec.
k thx
quick, maybe dumb, question... is it possible to nudge the oo_overlay up so it lies underneath the nav bar (like it does in the orange BB?)
or is it a bkg vs element type thing
I think it jacks the aspect ratio
testing it out
will send screenshot shortly

ok. i got it. let's do full height, and i'll build in the transparetn pixels, so i'll send a new oo_overlay
wait
:grinning:
one sec

A file was shared
could you check those for symmetry?
yes i can

k
oh wait. fuck
nope. i was confused
12 shift
ok
new teal sshot coming shorlty

<@U026PHQ3J> and <@U026103R3> I know why the red indicator is all f'ed up now. Basically because we don't get UserBadgeTypes from the server until we hit the badge hub and the counts of awarded badges are based on that. I am going to set up another badge counting scheme that counts badges as they arrive and make user badge types secondary to badge counting. This will probably lead to some logic fixes in the badge hub as well. I will fix this stuff in a little bit after dinner
Ok sounds good thanks Matt
A file was shared
